headline: How can I help the Ukraine defense forces?
description: Honestly I am trying to follow the instructions for giving funds to the army here https://armysos.com.ua/en/help-the-army  But for an American the instructions are not clear. We are not used to giving direct to bank accounts and instead typically rely on credit card. Can someone help me figure out how to do this? Western Union didn't seem to work for me
headline_zh-Hans: 我怎样才能帮助乌克兰国防军？
headline_zh-Hant: 我怎樣才能幫助烏克蘭國防軍？
description_zh-Hans: 老实说，我正在努力遵循向这里的军队提供资金的指示，https://armysos.com.ua/en/help-the-army，但对于一个美国人来说，指示并不明确。我们不习惯直接向银行账户捐款，而是通常依靠信用卡。谁能帮我弄清楚怎么做？西联汇款似乎对我不起作用。
description_zh-Hant: 老實說，我正在努力遵循向這裡的軍隊提供資金的指示，https://armysos.com.ua/en/help-the-army，但對於一個美國人來說，指示並不明確。我們不習慣直接向銀行賬戶捐款，而是通常依靠信用卡。誰能幫我弄清楚怎麼做？西聯匯款似乎對我不起作用。
